Class LanguageProviderTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ryhma6.maven.steambeater.model.LanguageProviderTest

  • public class LanguageProviderTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Testing that the language provider works as intended (saving and retrieving locale from a file, using String-resources based on the active locale)
